## Problem

```{r}
r <- 0.5
d <- 2
rho <- matrix(r, d, d)
diag(rho) <- 1.0

size <- 12
prob <- 0.75
margins <- rep(list(list("nbinom", size = size, prob = prob)), d)

rho
adjustForDiscrete(rho, margins, nSigmas = 6)
```
